name: Trap The Bee
description:
This is a simple gaming app with just one simple rule. Try your best to trap the bee within the matrix of pentagon.

Just tap on the gray dots and they will turn to green. The bee is blocked by these green blocks.

But you have to surround the bee before it escapes!

Can you do it?

*If you are on a browser just copy the link and download it through Google Play Store. Leave your comments if you wish to on Google Play review and thank you very much for your kind contributions. :)
